1.a1: Jouez sur { Server } avec Minecraft Java Édition:

1.a8: Select { Server } from the list and click "Join Server".

3.q: Est-ce que { Server } a un serveur Minecraft: Bedrock / Pocket Edition (PE) ?
3.a1: Oui, { Server } est un Minecraft: Bedrock ou était précédemment connu sous le nom d'un serveur Pocket Edition.
3.a2: No. You can only join { Server } using Minecraft Java Edition.
3.a3: Yes! { Server } supports both Minecraft: Bedrock Edition and Minecraft: Java Edition

4.q: Is { Server } a free to play Minecraft Server?
4.a: Yes, { Server } is a free to play Minecraft server.

5.q: I have an issue or I need help with something. Where or who do I contact about { Server }?
